description: The 1126 in the name of this restaurant refers to the year in which the hilltop hamlet in which it is situated was founded. Today the hamlet is home to apartments with their own kitchen, as well as the main villa. In the restaurant, a young enthusiastic couple serves contemporary - style cuisine made from local ingredients.
